title: UNFAIR Leaver Buster
body:
I have to relaunch the client! as network issues have lagged that bad, that the game has frozen. I returned to the game "before it has finished" and after I am issued leaver buster?

Clearly I returned to the game and had network issues beyond my control. So please tell why I have to get Leaver Buster?

Riot Answer please?

irate customer,

Pinibear
